products.title: Bella Blackout Vine Green 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This luscious bella blackout vine green vertical blind brings cooling splash of green to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office.

products.title: Bella Blackout Pear Green 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This lush pear green vertical blind adds a bold splash of colour and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Mirage Vertical Blind
products.description: A lightly textured blackout fabric available in a range of colours. Dim out options available in the splash range. Bella mirage vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Bella Vine (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
